Title: Siblings Fighting Strategy
Text: Carer: “Remember the house rules – be kind to each other and play nicely. If you can’t do this, the consequence is that you have to each play separately in your room for half an hour. This is your warning. If I have to come back in here, you are going to your rooms.”

Options.Description: Children: "Ok, We are sorry. We'll be good, can we just keep playing."

Options.Text: The children beg to keep playing.
